verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Njoni tumwimbie na kumshangilia,
njoni tumwabudu Bwana.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: 1. Njoni tumjongee njoni kwa masifu njoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 2.Tumfanyie shangwe mwamba wa wokovunjoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 3.Yeye ndiye Bwana yeye Mungu mkuu njoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 4.Yeye ndiye mfalme wa wafalme wote njoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 5.Milima ni yake pia makorongo njoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 6.Bahari ni yake pia nchi kavu njoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: 7.Yeye Mungu wetu aliye tuumba njoni tumwabudu Bwana

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: 8.Sisi ndio watu wa malisho yake njoni tumwabudu Bwana
